metadata.title: CVE-2020-8159 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There is a vulnerability in actionpack_page-caching gem < v1.2.1 thatallows an attacker to write arbitrary files to a web server, potentiallyresulting in remote code execution if the attacker can write unescaped ERBto a view.

criterions.comment: ruby-actionpack-page-caching: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
